biotools.summary: CODONOME collects the expression value of each codon (just called "codonome") and of each aminoacyl-tRNA synthetase (aaRS). To do this, the software is able to count the total mRNA codon number of any organism and to import and integrate any mRNA expression data source in tabulated text format.

bioschemas.name: Codonome
